message: money, 50% equality if is a good idea, just experience for younger developers
I'd have to ask for cash, probably a flat fee with VERY solid & inflexible scope. After the initial launch then there's room for talk of equity / hourly rate for more features

if you can really fire me up for the idea and I'm not strapped for money ... equity, otherwise money will get me to build pretty much anything; with the caveat that more interesting things cost you less
